vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κρᾰταιό-ω,
strengthen, τὰς χεῖράς τινος Vetus Testamentum Graece redditum LXX.1Ki.23.16, +others:—passive, [NT], etc.; κ. ὑπέρ τινα to be too strong for him, prevail against him, [LXX]
__2 passive, to be determined, κ. τοῦ πορεύεσθαι [LXX]
__II intransitive in active, prevail, ἐπί τινας [LXX]; ὑπέρ τινας [LXX]

__III middle, control, [Refs 1st c.AD+].
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be strong, become strong strengthen
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be strong, become strong strengthen
to strengthen, render strong, corroborate, confirm;, passive to grow strong, acquire strength, Lk. 1:80; 2:40; Eph. 3:16; to be firm, resolute, 1Cor. 16:13*
